entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a person who is trying to help Harry escape. He is mentioned as 'you' and is being addressed by Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is being helped by Sirius and is in a hurry to leave.

entities.name: flitwick
entities.description: Flitwick is a person who has an office that Harry needs to avoid. He is mentioned as having an office that will be searched by others.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another person who is injured and being helped by Madam Pomfrey. He is mentioned as 'the other boy'.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is a person who is helping Ron recover from his injuries. She is mentioned as being able to make him better.

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: Buckbeak is an animal that Sirius is riding. He is mentioned as pawing the ground and tossing his head.

relationships.description: Sirius is helping Harry escape by telling him to go quickly.
Madam Pomfrey is caring for Ron and trying to make him better.
Sirius is riding Buckbeak as they try to escape.
